original_title: Bữa Tối, Bánh Ngọt Và Anh
overview: Huy, a promising young cook, was fired from the five-star restaurant where he worked by his boss, jealous of his talent. Without any more income, he still has to take care of his younger student sister. At the same time, Thang, a childhood friend, resurfaces. Although they didn't part on very good terms the last time they met, they ended up starting a catering business together. As they work together and face different obstacles, their feelings begin to change.
title: Beef, Cupcakes and Him
